p: But the clinical efficacy of ART in preventing HIV transmission may not translate into an equally large population-level impact on HIV incidence in real-life settings [ 9]. In particular, for TasP programmes to be effective, a high proportion of PLWH must 1) be diagnosed, 2) be linked to care, 3) remain in care, and 4) adhere to ART. An ambitious programme of implementation science now seeks to improve each step of this HIV treatment cascade [ 10â€“ 17].
